citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 9:25 am on 13-JAN-
21.
The inspector knocked on all doors, honked the horn, left a message at the contact phone number on file, and waited 30
minutes before departing the facility.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 9:25 am on 13-JAN-
21. 
The inspector knocked on all doors, honked the horn, left a message at the contact phone number on file, and waited 30 
minutes before departing the facility. 
 
 
 
End Section
